import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReportButton(){const[key,setKey]=useState([]);const[value,setValue]=useState([]);const[minPrice,setMinPrice]=useState("");const[maxPrice,setMaxPrice]=useState("");const[filteredData,setFilteredData]=useState([]);const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/report-page");setKey(Object.keys(response.data[0]));//FOR COLON
const valueArray=[];//TODO OK VALULERİ EKLYOR ARRAY'E
for(let i=0;i<Object.values(response.data).length;i++){valueArray.push(Object.values(response.data[i]));}setValue(valueArray);//FOR ROW
}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data",error);}};const handleMinPriceChange=event=>{setMinPrice(event.target.value);};const handleMaxPriceChange=event=>{setMaxPrice(event.target.value);};const applyPriceFilter=()=>{if(!minPrice||!maxPrice){// Eğer min veya max fiyat boşsa, filtreleme yapmayın
return;}const filtered=value.filter(row=>{const price=parseFloat(row[4]);// 4. index fiyat alanı varsayıldı, gerektiğinde değiştirilebilir
return price>=parseFloat(minPrice)&&price<=parseFloat(maxPrice);});setFilteredData(filtered);};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchData,className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Veriyi Getir"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Min Fiyat",value:minPrice,onChange:handleMinPriceChange,className:"mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Max Fiyat",value:maxPrice,onChange:handleMaxPriceChange,className:"mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:applyPriceFilter,className:"bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",children:"Filtrele"}),key.length>0&&(filteredData.length>0?filteredData:value).length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table-auto mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:key.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-800",children:item},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:(filteredData.length>0?filteredData:value).map((innerArray,outerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:innerArray.map((item,innerIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:item},innerIndex))},outerIndex))})]})]});}export default ReportButton;// TODO USE EFFECT VE AXİOS İLE BİLGİLERİ GETİR ORADAN DA ONLARI GRİDLE TABLO ŞEKLİNDE BUTONU CLİCKLEDİĞİNDE
